00046 class _OgreRTSSExport CGProgramWriter : public ProgramWriter
00047 {
00048 
00049 // Interface.
00050 public:
00051 
00055     CGProgramWriter();
00056 
00058     virtual ~CGProgramWriter();
00059 
00063     virtual void writeSourceCode(std::ostream& os, Program* program);
00064 
00068     virtual const String& getTargetLanguage() const { return TargetLanguage; }
00069 
00070     static String TargetLanguage;
00071 
00072 // Protected methods.
00073 protected:
00074 
00076     void initializeStringMaps();
00077 
00079     void writeProgramDependencies(std::ostream& os, Program* program);
00080     
00082     void writeUniformParameter(std::ostream& os, UniformParameterPtr parameter);
00083 
00085     void writeFunctionParameter(std::ostream& os, ParameterPtr parameter);
00086 
00088     void writeLocalParameter(std::ostream& os, ParameterPtr parameter);
00089 
00091     void writeFunctionDeclaration(std::ostream& os, Function* function, ParameterPtr & colorParameter);
00092 
00094     void writeAtomInstance(std::ostream& os, FunctionAtom* atom);
00095 
00096 
00097 protected:
00098     typedef map<GpuConstantType, const char*>::type GpuConstTypeToStringMap;
00099     typedef map<Parameter::Semantic, const char*>::type ParamSemanticToStringMap;
00100 
00101 // Attributes.
00102 protected:
00103     // Map between GPU constant type to string value.
00104     GpuConstTypeToStringMap mGpuConstTypeMap;
00105     // Map between parameter semantic to string value.
00106     ParamSemanticToStringMap mParamSemanticMap;
00107 };

00112 class _OgreRTSSExport ShaderProgramWriterCGFactory : public ProgramWriterFactory
00113 {
00114 public:
00115     ShaderProgramWriterCGFactory()
00116     {
00117         mLanguage = "cg";
00118     }
00119     virtual ~ShaderProgramWriterCGFactory() {}
00120 
00124     virtual const String& getTargetLanguage(void) const
00125     {
00126         return mLanguage;
00127     }
00128 
00132     virtual ProgramWriter* create(void)
00133     {
00134         return OGRE_NEW CGProgramWriter();
00135     }
00136 
00137 private:
00138     String mLanguage;
00139 
00140 };
